title: La Moglie In Vacanza L'amante In Citta 1980

sources.title: La Moglie In Vacanza L'amante In Citta 1980
sources.description: Is there a term for an Italian version of a French Bedroom Farce? Husbands and wives cheating on each other. Edwige Fenech and Barbara Bouchet are teamed with Renzo Montagnani and Lino Banfi yet again.Â  Italian with English subtitles
